input.sentences: the famous center was known for its landscaping .
the greenhouse was an indoor botanical treat .
fountains were adorned with flowers and shrubs .
notable structures | like a traditional red phone booth | were present .
the lake was especially beautiful to view .
output.sentences: At the castle's center was its famous landscaping.
Another treat is the indoor greenery of its greenhouse.
The beauty continues with shrubs, fountains and flowers.
In contrast to the greenery are traditional structures in red.
The castle has a beautiful view of the lake.
